sentence.Network_en: Sabre Cats are a race of bipedal, intelligent beings with many feline features.
sentence.Network_cn: 剑猫是一个种族的bipedal, 智能的人与许多猫的特点.

sentence.Network_en: They can also become rolling loops or bipedal, walking robots.
sentence.Network_cn: 链型机器人也可以组装成环型的滚动机器人或两足步行机器人.

sentence.Network_en: The principle, research method and appraise criterion on Passive - Dynamic bipedal robot are introduced.
sentence.Network_cn: 介绍了被动动力式两足机器人的基本原理 、 究方法、价标准.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin bipes, biped- (from bi- 'having two' + pes, ped- 'foot') + -al
